name: Anti-Mage
title: Magina
lore: The monks of Turstarkuri watched the rugged valleys from their mountain temple, practicing meditation and martial arts.

manaBurn.name: Mana Break
manaBurn.description: Burns mana from enemies with each attack, dealing bonus damage equal to mana burned.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move instantly to a target point.

spellShield.name: Counterspell
spellShield.description: Creates a shield that blocks and reflects targeted spells back at the caster.

manaVoid.name: Mana Void
manaVoid.description: Deals massive damage to a target based on how much mana they're missing. Stuns and damages nearby enemies.
